article_title: Data Sharing and Open Source Software Help Combat Covid-19
article_description: Scientists are rapidly analyzing genetic samples from infected patients and sharing the data  But to move too fast is to risk making mistakes
article_content: On February 27  a teenager in the Seattle area was diagnosed with Covid 19  Shortly after  researchers at the Seattle Flu Study shared genomic data about his strain of the virus with other researchers on an open science site  Armed with that data  researchers   4497 chars
